org.springframework.lang

注释类型 UsesJava8

  • 已过时。 
    as of 5.0 since the framework is based on Java 8+ now

    @Retention(value=CLASS)
 @Target(value={METHOD,CONSTRUCTOR,TYPE})
 @Documented
 @Deprecated
public @interface UsesJava8
    Indicates that the annotated element uses Java 8 specific API constructs, without implying that it strictly requires Java 8.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.1
    作者:
    Stephane Nicoll
